subject: Re: KGTMS Launch Breakfast - Invitation design

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

That looks awesome!! Thank you 😊

Best

Shannen



Shannen Chia

Community Fundraising Coordinator - Kiss Goodbye to MS

MS Research Australia

02 8413 7918 • 1300 785 717

schia@msra.org.au• http://www.msra.org.au/

Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi Heath Thank you for providing the two options - they look great. We'd like to go with the attached option, but just a few minor changes:
  • Can you please change the lines to our red?
  • Please make "You're invited" a bit bigger
Thanks heaps Heath! Let us know if you have any questions. Shannen Shannen Chia Community Fundraising Coordinator - Kiss Goodbye to MS MS Research Australia 02 8413 7918 • 1300 785 717 schia@msra.org.au• http://www.msra.org.au/ Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060 This email message and any accompanying attachments may contain information that is confidential and is subject to legal privilege. Hi Tanja, 

Ok sure, please see the 2 variations attached. The header photo limits what we copy we can put over the top of it and have it still be legible if that makes sense?

Let me know what you think?

Hi Heath, Thanks for sending this through. We do prefer the image selection and placement from draft 1, can you please adjust accordingly? Once the images are back in place, please play around with the colour/placement of the heading. Please provide the following options:
  • Including pink background, with 'You're invited' in white & black font instead of red
  • Excluding pink background, with different colour/placement of heading and excluding block of colour behind heading
Please apply changes to address and RSVP box as per our previous email. Thanks so much, Tanja

Hi Tanja, 

Sure, please see attached and let me know what you think?

Hi Heath, Thanks for putting this together so quickly - it looks lovely! Can you please include the below blurb: Join us for breakfast at this stunning harbourside family home to officially launch and celebrate the second year of our annual record-breaking The May 50K challenge, and to get an exclusive sneak peek of MS Research Australia's guidelines on important lifestyle factors impacting people living with MS.
  • The pink background worked well for the Beauty with Bonnie event because of the make-up nature, however in this instance it seems a little out of context. Can you please provide a second option with a different coloured background and play around with the current layout and placement of the heading 'You're invited' as we would prefer for the heading to stand alone without a block of colour.
  • Please change the location to: "The harbourside family home, 5 Collins Avenue, Rose Bay
  • Please write out 'March' in RSVP box
Let us know if you've got any questions before proceeding. Thanks so much, Tanja

Hi Shannen, 

We have created the invite for you and attached. Let me know if you have the blurb copy ready and we can add that too.

Hi Shannen, 

Ok sure, leave it with me : )

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Wolf IQ team,


Can you please assist with the invitation design of our upcoming launch event?


We're after a beautiful A5 save the date, similar layout to the recent Beauty with Bonnie invitation, and same vibe to previous launch event invitations (attached). I've attached a couple of images for you to play with and please also use our font 'Yorkshire Brush Script' and include the MS Research Australia and KGTMS logo.


If you could please prepare a first draft by COB Thursday, that would be amazing.


Please find all details below.


Thanks so much,

Shannen





You're invited!
Name: Kiss Goodbye to MS Launch Breakfast


Blurb:
XXXXX (Please allow some space for this as we're still confirming blurb)


Date: Wednesday 1st April
Time: 8.30am for a 9am start, event concludes by 10.30am
Dress: A touch of red
Location: The stunning harbourside family home, 5 Collins Avenue, Rose Bay
Parking: We recommend catching an Uber/Taxi to the venue


Please RSVP to Shannen
schia@msra.org.au by Friday 20th March

attachments.filename: Kiss Goodbye to MS Launch Breakfast Invite.png
